column1:
Overall, the Cleanliness, Amenities, Location, Services and General scores have seen an improvement over the years. The highest score was recorded in 2018 for Cleanliness, Location and General scores. The highest score was recorded in 2017 for Amenities and Services. 

To further improve the scores for Cleanliness, ensure that the property is well-maintained and hygienic at all times. Provide visitors with high quality amenities such as comfortable beds, amenities with modern appliances, fast and reliable WiFi, and well-maintained facilities. Ensure that the location is convenient and close to important landmarks and transportation hubs. Provide top-notch customer service and maintain a professional staff that is willing to help visitors when needed. Finally, take a look at the overall value proposition and see how it can be improved to give visitors a better overall experience.
